description.value:
Frequency once per round

Effect The dragon lets out a mighty roar that rouses their allies and rattles the souls of their enemies. Each ally in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:120] gains temporary Hit Points equal to the dragon's level that last for 1 minute, while each enemy within that area must attempt a @Check[will|dc:|options:area-effect,inflicts:doomed,inflicts:fleeing,inflicts:frightened] save.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.Effect: Soul Roar (Ally)]

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to Soul Roar for 1 minute.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1}. If the target is already doomed, the doomed value increases by 1 (to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 4}).

Critical Failure The creature gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] condition for 1 round, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 4}, and is doomed 1. If the target is already doomed, the doomed value increases by 1 (to a maximum of doomed 4).
